Html:
Hi,

Thanks for creating such a great project - this does exactly what i hoped it would.

I'm having trouble creating a marker on the map using vb.net with the following code

Dim m As New GMapNET.Marker(New GMapNET.PointLatLng(lat, lng))
m.Text = "Test Marker"
MapControl.AddMarker(m)

Is there something obvious i've missed?

Thanks
you missed nothing, just Trunk version is in development and curently do not draw markers and routes...
